attributes.additional_details: This is an ePetition to stop the erosion of Salford by altering our political and geographical boundaries. We the people of the CITY of Salford do not want to be labeled or classed in any way as a borough or annex of Manchester. We do not want these changes and we are apposed to them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Boundary Commission for England who are indpendant of central Government. The Commission are currently conducting a consultation on their boundary review and comments from the public are welcome.
